name: Everyday Golf VR
description: EVERYDAY GOLF VR is a realistic golf VR game. We have been continuously mulling over how to improve user convenience without losing realism so that people can easily play our game whether they are familiar with golf or not.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 equivalent or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space
